channel.title: 彭博-市场

item.title: 以下是彼得-蒂尔最新招募的 100,000 美元奖学金获得者在谈到离开大学时说的话，以及他们参加该计划的原因
item.description:
Here's what Peter Thiel's latest $100,000-fellowship recruits said about leaving college and why they joined the program https://t.co/TU8jOiVcLZ

item.title: 黑山最高法院暂缓执行下级法官早些时候做出的将前加密货币大亨杜权引渡到韩国的决定
item.description:
Montenegro’s Supreme Court suspended earlier decisions by lower-level judges to extradite former crypto mogul Do Kwon to South Korea https://t.co/MoOiHH2qcv

item.title: 华伦天奴创意总监即将离开由卡塔尔 Mayhoola 公司控制的意大利时装品牌

item.title: 想象一下，在这个世界上，物价和工资在近 30 年的时间里从未有过大的变化。这就是日本几十年来的故事，但也许不会太久了。@rumireports 发自东京
item.description:
Imagine a world where prices and salaries never change much – for almost 30 years.

That’s been Japan’s story for decades, but maybe not for long. @rumireports from Tokyo https://t.co/moNbMZMm4O pic.twitter.com/Ole1j9ZNJ2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 加密货币持有者在华盛顿的影响力还不大
item.description:
Crypto owners don’t have much sway in Washington—yet https://t.co/bR99JENr43

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他手头有近 5 亿美元现金，这笔巨款仍不足以支付前总统三天后到期的上诉保证金。
item.description:
Donald Trump said he has almost $500 million in cash on hand, a hefty sum that would still fall short of covering the former president’s appeal bond due in three days https://t.co/naGSnk7TA7

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: "这一次，其实是你爸爸的技术集会。"作者：@RyanVlastelica
item.description:

item.title: 欢迎来到学校，这里其实是一家工厂。为了帮助解决他们在劳动力方面的难题，制造商们正在向一种古怪但必要的副业靠拢。
item.description:
Welcome to school; it's actually a factory. To help solve their labor headaches, manufacturers are leaning into a quirky but necessary side gig. https://t.co/XV2RCEwQWY

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole）的一名高级投资银行家因要求一名女助理与其共度良宵而被解雇，并失去了 100 万欧元（110 万美元）的不公平解雇赔偿金。
item.description:
A top Credit Agricole investment banker, fired for asking a female assistant to spend the night with him, has lost out on a €1 million ($1.1 million) unfair-dismissal payout https://t.co/LjeH1EHi04

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 联邦调查局抓获了世界顶级石油交易商行贿。我们有录音带
item.description:
The FBI caught the world's top oil trader paying bribes. We have the tapes https://t.co/6OJMmugyOV

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 巴基斯坦新任财政部长穆罕默德-奥朗泽布（Muhammad Aurangzeb）告诉彭博社，巴基斯坦今年将首次出售多达 3 亿美元的熊猫债券，以此来吸引中国投资者。
item.description:
Pakistan is keen to tap Chinese investors by selling as much as $300 million in Panda bonds for the first time ever this year, new finance minister Muhammad Aurangzeb tells Bloomberg https://t.co/YdroazjwWM pic.twitter.com/7zHppMaivg

— Bloomberg (@business) March 22, 2024

item.title: 对冲基金 ExodusPoint 去年年底停止了巴维特-索贾尼（Bhavit Sawjani）的交易，索贾尼是一名著名的雇员，他是迪拜的投资组合经理，领导着一个六人团队，去年亏损超过 7000 万美元。
item.description:
Hedge fund ExodusPoint stopped Bhavit Sawjani, a marquee hire and Dubai-based portfolio manager who led a six-member team, from trading late last year following losses of more than $70 million. https://t.co/BwxTUQZYJM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 60/40 投资组合依然有效
item.description:
The 60/40 portfolio still works https://t.co/uNOG9lV9Oh

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 中国放宽了跨境数据流动规则，缩小了需要安全评估的数据种类范围
item.description:
China relaxed rules governing cross-border data flows by narrowing the kinds of data that require security evaluation https://t.co/h2VS0MxTX7

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 加拿大财政部长克里斯蒂娅-弗里兰（Chrystia Freeland）准备在下个月公布预算案，加拿大政府支出增长速度超过收入增长速度，利息支出持续攀升。
item.description:
Canadian government spending is growing faster than revenue increases and interest payments continue to climb, as Finance Minister Chrystia Freeland prepares to deliver her budget next month https://t.co/MpYbHmlXKg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 长达数年之久的芬太尼药物过量致死浪潮给美国人造成了巨大创伤。每 10 名摇摆州选民中就有 8 人认为消除这一祸害是当务之急。阅读大事件 ⤵️
item.description:
Americans have been traumatized by a years-long wave of overdose deaths caused by fentanyl. Ending the scourge is a priority, according to 8 in 10 swing-state voters

Read the Big Take ⤵️https://t.co/gwkxzDGjjN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 墨西哥年通货膨胀率上升，支持墨西哥银行对利率的谨慎立场
item.description:
Mexico’s Annual Inflation Rate Ticks Up, Backing Cautious Banxico Stance on Rates https://t.co/JjWCH0QfuT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 穆罕默德-埃尔-埃里安（Mohamed El-Erian）认为，2024 年 10 年期国债收益率约为 4.25% 是 "合理 "的平均水平，因为今年最大的赌注之一即将实现。
item.description:
A yield on 10-year Treasuries of around 4.25% is a “reasonable” average for 2024 as one of the year’s biggest bets comes to pass, according to Mohamed El-Erian. https://t.co/kATYGkmy5I

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 塞内加尔民主党支持反对党候选人巴西鲁-迪奥马耶-法耶（Bassirou Diomaye Faye），这有可能改变即将举行的大选的格局
item.description:
The Senegalese Democratic Party throws its support behind opposition candidate Bassirou Diomaye Faye, in a potential game changer ahead of the upcoming election https://t.co/YkcvBSquTm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 周五，长期国债收益率跌至一周多以来的最低水平，这使得通胀放缓将允许美联储和其他央行降息的预期推动的债券市场涨势更加强劲
item.description:
Yields on long-dated Treasuries fell to their lowest levels in more than a week Friday, adding to bond-market gains driven by expectations that slowing inflation will allow the Fed and other central banks to cut interest rates https://t.co/NJn5CVKhrM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 数字世界收购公司（Digital World Acquisition）将与前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体公司合并，有报道称该公司获得了足够多的股东支持，之后投资者抛售了该公司的股票。
item.description:
Investors dumped shares of Digital World Acquisition, the blank-check firm set to merge with former president Donald Trump’s social media company, after reports that it got enough shareholder support for the deal. https://t.co/ScwgLXfEaL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 管理巴西亿万富翁莫雷拉-萨雷斯家族财富的家族办公室将其管理的资产增加到近 110 亿美元，同时增加了员工。
item.description:
The family office managing the fortune of Brazil’s billionaire Moreira Salles clan boosted its assets under management to nearly $11 billion while adding staff. https://t.co/wHxLvY31bJ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 法国和德国同意联手通过制造商 KNDS 的新子公司在乌克兰生产弹药
item.description:
France and Germany agree to join forces to produce ammunition in Ukraine through a new subsidiary of manufacturer KNDS https://t.co/sKeALNqbP8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 财政部调查了一名参加 1 月 6 日国会大厦骚乱的员工。FOIA 记录显示，该案件被移交起诉，但从未提出指控。
item.description:
Treasury investigated an employee for showing up at the Jan. 6 Capitol riots. The case was referred for prosecution but charges were never filed, FOIA records show https://t.co/w7as3rOBAt

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 当全世界都在关注加沙的苦难时，以色列北部却发生了一场平行冲突，如果事态失控，造成的破坏将比加沙战争更大 ⤵️ via @bpolitics
item.description:
While the world is focused on Gazan suffering, there is a parallel conflict in Israel's north which -- if things get out of hand -- will result in even greater devastation than the war in Gaza ⤵️https://t.co/yZSItKa7aU via @bpolitics

— Onur Ant (@MenaInNews) March 22, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 比尔-格罗斯警告说，随着 "过度繁荣 "席卷金融市场，投资者将面临颠簸。
item.description:
